name: realtime-collaborative-code-editor
description: A sophisticated web-based collaborative code editor that enables multiple users to write, edit, and view code together in real-time

scripts.install-all: cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && pnpm install
scripts.start: concurrently "cd backend && npm start" "cd frontend && pnpm run dev"
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd backend && npm run dev" "cd frontend && pnpm run dev"

author: Developer
